title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Family Farming Diversification, Integrated Markets, Nutrition and Climate Resilience Project (REDE)

description.narrative: The project¿s overarching goal is to sustainably increase the income and dietary diversity of rural households in the country¿s eastern and northern regions. Its development objective is to provide assistance for family farming diversification and adaptation to CC to increase access to markets and dietary diversity in the Bafatá, Cacheu, Gabú and Oio regions, in alignment with IFAD¿s Country Strategy Note (CSN), while fostering entrepreneurship among rural youth and women, persons with disabilities and migrants who have returned to the country and their integration into regional and subregional trade corridors. The project will directly contribute to the achievement of United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) 1, 2, 5, 8 and 13 and CSN objectives.The project¿s overarching goal is to sustainably increase the income and dietary diversity of rural households in the country¿s eastern and northern regions. Its development objective is to provide assistance for family farming diversification and adaptation to CC to increase access to markets and dietary diversity in the Bafatá, Cacheu, Gabú and Oio regions, in alignment with IFAD¿s Country Strategy Note (CSN), while fostering entrepreneurship among rural youth and women, persons with disabilities and migrants who have returned to the country and their integration into regional and subregional trade corridors. The project will directly contribute to the achievement of United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) 1, 2, 5, 8 and 13 and CSN objectives.The project¿s overarching goal is to sustainably increase the income and dietary diversity of rural households in the country¿s eastern and northern regions. The project will directly contribute to the achievement of United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) 1, 2, 5, 8 and 13 and CSN objectives.
